item.title: Help us help you...
item.description: When you are saying something isn't working, actually tell us what section isn't. Cause you saying "not working" or "juststudying.uk" doesn't help. When we load the site it works perfectly fine. - Also add your email to it so we can contact you about it so we can fix the "issue"

item.title: Small update
item.description: Didn't add much here. working on some features behind the scene but they arent ready to be released at all. And can you guys beat my score. send it in Q&A. added the pokemon game cuz somebody asked

item.title: I need a way to contact back
item.description: Can you guys please provide a way of contact. I want to be able to help but you guys just send one message and dont explain further. Add a email or something? Also dont forget your GCSE's if u from uk

item.title: GCSE Exams!
item.description: We know everyone here loves playing JustStudy and to be honest focuses on playing games more than learning. Just remember for the Year 11's it's now GCSE week! All the exams are going to come at a fast pace. Use the revision lessons wisely and limit your time playing JustStudy! If you actually want to study there will be studying resources for English LIT+LANG, Maths, Combined SCI and more soon...

item.title: Bloons galore
item.description: Apes against helium rubber balls. i like the bloon games so i decided to bundle most of the first and classic games. have fun! "might add bloons td5 but its very slow". Also added blockpost

item.title: New Sorting type and more
item.description: I have added a new sorting type... Popularity! This shows how much players went into the game in the past week. which resets each week. so maybe for example slope got popular one week then it reset and a different game got popular! I also updated the news. the old one was ugly so I did a little revamp. hope you guys like it!
